extracted_text:
On August 27, 2025, ETERNAL Ltd (parent company of Zomato and Blinkit) was in the news for receiving three GST tax demand and penalty orders totaling over ₹40 crore .

The tax demand was imposed by the Joint Commissioner-4, Bengaluru, and covers the period from July 2017 to March 2020.

The total amount includes ₹17.19 crore in GST, ₹21.42 crore in interest, and a penalty of ₹1.71 crore.

The demand was issued for alleged underpayment of output tax and excess availment of input tax credit.

According to a regulatory filing made on Monday, August 25, the company intends to challenge the order, stating that it has a strong case based on legal counsel and does not anticipate a financial impact.
